reviews.name: Peanuts Snoopy Blanket
reviews.reviewText: My new blanket is so soft and warm that I sleep with it every night. It is large enough to wrap yourself in it and never want to come out!
reviews.title: I love this blanket

reviews.name: Peanuts Snoopy Blanket
reviews.reviewText: GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY, WOULD LIKE TO ORDER ANOTHER ONE BUT NOW HAS BEEN DELEATED
reviews.title: GOOD

reviews.name: Peanuts Snoopy Blanket
reviews.reviewText: Love my Snoopy Blanket. Great quality soft and comfy. Great service as well.
reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.name: Peanuts Snoopy Blanket
reviews.reviewText: The type of gift that any woman likes. Perfect blanket to sleep with, those time when you need to tuck in in a warm and nice blanket. My sister slept with it from the first night on
reviews.title: it's Lovely blanket Charlie Brown

reviews.name: Peanuts Snoopy Blanket
reviews.reviewText: I bought this blanket for me because it is a larger than normal fleece blanket. My son stole it from me the first day and I have yet to use it, but he loves how extra big it is.
reviews.title: Oversized Fleece
